statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, access_level FROM users WHERE access_level > 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE access_level IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE password LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE access_level > 1 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT username, access_level FROM users WHERE password = '123456';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE access_level IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, access_level FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, access_level FROM Users WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM Tasks WHERE task_id > 2;
SELECT Users.username, Tasks.task_name FROM Users, Tasks WHERE Users.user_id = Tasks.assigned_to;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM Tasks WHERE assigned_to = 3;
SELECT username, access_level FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE access_level = 'User' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, Users.username FROM Tasks JOIN Users ON Tasks.assigned_to = Users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, access_level FROM users ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, access_level FROM users WHERE access_level > 1;
SELECT * FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT task_name, description FROM tasks WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, access_level FROM users WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT task_name, description FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, t.task_name, ta.assigned_date FROM users u JOIN task_assignments ta ON u.user_id = ta.user_id JOIN tasks t ON ta.task_id = t.task_id;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_id IN (SELECT task_id FROM task_assignments);
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, access_level FROM users WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT project_name FROM projects WHERE project_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT users.username, tasks.task_name FROM users INNER JOIN tasks ON users.user_id = tasks.assigned_to;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE access_level = 'admin'
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE access_level = 'user' ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT project_name FROM projects JOIN project_tasks ON projects.project_id = project_tasks.project_id WHERE task_id = 5
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_id > 3 ORDER BY project_name ASC
SELECT username, access_level FROM users ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM task_assignees WHERE assignee_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE access_level >= 3;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.access_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE access_level = 1;
SELECT tasks.task_name, tasks.task_description, users.username FROM tasks JOIN users ON tasks.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT assignee_name FROM task_assignees WHERE task_id = 3 ORDER BY assignee_name DESC;
SELECT u.username, ar.role_name, al.access_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN access_levels al ON ur.access_id = al.access_id;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_id IN (SELECT task_id FROM task_assignees WHERE assignee_id = 2);
